result.execSummary:
The defendant Alan M Souvannasone was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alan M Souvannasone is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Alan M Souvannasone was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs remitted. $67 VW surcharge to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.  $200 DNA surcharge remitted.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence toward KF.

Completion of certified domestic violence treatment.  Random UA & BA testing at discretion of agent.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alan M Souvannasone

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt: Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights. Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Judgment of conviction prepared.
and Notice of DNA and Witness List (Plaintiff's)

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
  - Defendant shall not threaten or direct any acts of physical violence against Kristen F.
  - Defendant shall not consume alcohol.
Trial Judge - Br 2

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Mauricio Cardona appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
